Yes, the show is proving to just be another Lost/Flash Forward.  Teasers of development, but no delivery.  Lots of backstory, and they by episode 6 they have destroyed all respect for the Uncle.  I am sure they were trying to make him into an anti-hero, but they overshot by a light year.

I had hope Kripke was going somewhere, but after episode 6 I realized that is unlikely.  Just giving it one more episode before writing this series off.
